New Records: Yoshinobu Yamamoto's third outing in 17 starts in 2024 where he failed to see north of four innings
Key Match Events: Mookie Betts hit a walk-off home run in the ninth inning
Shohei Ohtani hit another home run and collected two stolen bases
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers are 14-5 when Mookie Betts sends a home run back into the stands
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers maintained their one-game lead over the Philadelphia Phillies atop the National League standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yoshinobu Yamamoto allowed four runs in three innings
The Dodgers re-signed a key outfielder to a three-year deal
The Dodgers are looking forward to a pair of three-game sets against the San Diego Padres and the Rockies again to end the 2024 campaign
